description: Implement Slider component (~120 lines) wrapping RAC Slider/SliderTrack/SliderThumb/SliderOutput. Supports single value OR range (array). Structure: Slider root with required color/size, SliderTrack renders fill via CSS --slider-fill-percent variable, SliderThumb with useTooltip showing current value on drag. Uses frozen B constant with CSS variable slots (--slider-track-*, --slider-thumb-*, --slider-fill-*), composeTailwindRenderProps, data-* attributes (data-orientation, data-dragging on thumb). NO useGesture - RAC handles drag internally. Reference: button.tsx for B constant, floating.tsx for useTooltip. Target: packages/components-next/src/inputs/slider.tsx
title: Slider component
